actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930, as amended, 19 U.S.C. 1301, et seq., to prohibit the importation of drug paraphernalia into the United States, and to prohibit the exportation of such articles from the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to prohibit persons from importing into or exporting from the United States drug paraphernalia. Provides for the forfeiture of such paraphernalia. Defines "drug paraphernalia."

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930, as amended, 19 U.S.C. 1301, et seq., to prohibit the importation of drug paraphernalia into the United States, and to prohibit the exportation of such articles from the United States.
